properties.name: aws.credentials.access-key
properties.description: AWS access key ID for authentication.

properties.name: aws.credentials.secret-key
properties.description: AWS secret access key for authentication.

properties.name: aws.credentials.session-token
properties.description: AWS session token for temporary credentials, required when using credentials from AWS STS, IAM roles, or the AWS Management Console.

properties.name: aws.location.place-index-name
properties.description: The name of the AWS Location Service place index to use for address lookups.

properties.name: aws.location.region
properties.description: AWS region where the Location Service is deployed.

properties.name: aws.location.data-provider
properties.description: The data provider for the AWS Location Service (e.g., 'Here', 'Esri').

properties.name: aws.location.api-key
properties.description: Optional API key for AWS Location Service to provide additional request authentication alongside AWS credentials.
